item.description:
Saturday September 24th 1PM-10PM The Milford Oktoberfest returns to the Rotary Pavilion at Fowler Field in a HUGE way. Admission is now just $10 dollars! Once inside theres a beer tent, food vendors, live bands, a moonbounce and more! Discounted tickets can be purchased online at: http://milfordoktoberfest.ticketleap.com/2011 How is this for an Oktoberfest line-up!
Total Hacks
The Elwoods
HitList
FreePlay. 
Mixed in with a DJ and German Dancers and we have an Oktoberfestival. Hope to see you there. Tickets will be available soon!

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Oktoberfest in Milford
